message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.
